text: “Uye musava munogara munzira dzose, mutyityidzira uye muchidzivirira kubva munzira yaAllah avo vanotenda mavari, uye muchitsvaga nzira dzokuiipisa. Uye rangarirai pamakanga muri vashoma, uye vakakuitai kuti muwande. Uye cherechedzai kuti akange akaita sei magumo eavo vaiita huori (zvakaipa, mhirizhonga).”
